attributes.action: Remove the incompetent Chancellor of the Exchequer who after all is only his puppet as he actually makes all the financial decisions for this arrogant and contemptuous government and furthermore to replace all the front line cabinet ministers and their juniors because there ability to explain themselves to the British public at large is non-existent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government's ability to explain themselves and there decisions is nothing short of rank arrogance. Everytime someone questions there policies old or new, we always get the stock answer we know best and have always got it right.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
